Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/5/0xb8789ac777710ee56e9f8c4bb3ff67a8e436c34d.sol#748-780) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/5/0xb8789ac777710ee56e9f8c4bb3ff67a8e436c34d.sol#769-778)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/5/0xb8789ac777710ee56e9f8c4bb3ff67a8e436c34d.sol#762-778)

Crowdsale.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0xb8789ac777710ee56e9f8c4bb3ff67a8e436c34d.sol#289-291)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0xb8789ac777710ee56e9f8c4bb3ff67a8e436c34d.sol#238-241)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0xb8789ac777710ee56e9f8c4bb3ff67a8e436c34d.sol#272)
